description: This file contains unit tests for the Searxng class, testing various methods including search, image_search, news_search, and category-specific searches, with mock HTTP responses.

classes.name: Searxng
classes.description: The class being tested, representing a search engine interface with various configuration options.

methods.name: searxng_instance
methods.description: Fixture creating a default Searxng instance.

methods.name: searxng_with_engines
methods.description: Fixture creating a Searxng instance with specific engines.

methods.name: searxng_with_fixed_results
methods.description: Fixture creating a Searxng instance with fixed maximum results.

methods.name: test_searxng_search
methods.description: Tests the search method of Searxng with mocked HTTP response.

methods.name: test_searxng_search_with_engines
methods.description: Tests search with specific engines configured.

methods.name: test_searxng_search_with_fixed_max_results
methods.description: Tests that fixed_max_results is respected during search.

methods.name: test_searxng_query_encoding
methods.description: Ensures query strings are properly URL encoded.

methods.name: test_searxng_initialization
methods.description: Tests initialization of Searxng with various parameters.

methods.name: test_category_searches
methods.description: Parameterized test for category-specific search methods.
